About the Company: Jagson Airlines (JAL), acquired the operations from Jagson International, a group company, by taking the aircraft on lease. The company provides air taxi services under the Open Sky Policy of the Government of India. It made a public issue in Oct.`94. JAL commenced operations in 1994-95 with one Dornier taken on lease from JIL. During the same year, it inducted one more Dornier to its fleet and opened up new stations like Jaisalmer, Jodhpur, Udaipur, Kullu, etc.
